name: sleek.js
title: Fully flexible mvc framework for node.js, developed using express, handlebars, mongodb as base dependecies with pluggable modules & themes support
author: Cubet Techno Labs, Cochin <info@cubettech.com>
description: Sleek.js is an MVC Framework implemented from Node.JS, built-in with base dependency on handlebars.js, express.js. Sleek.js architecture follows common format of MVC which makes it easy to handle and build better web apps with pluggable modules & themes support.
